basics.label: Sr. Workforce Manager
basics.summary: Results-oriented Workforce & Relationship Manager with diverse background in management & customer service, dedicated to providing excellent customer service and making operational and procedural improvements that drive savings.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Reduction of non-productive agent time by 33%, forecasting 14 million yearly contacts within +/- 5% of projection FY16. Managed a team for operational efficiency and made significant savings through effective resource allocation.
highlights: Reduced onshore hours by 46%; saved $17 million annually
Saved $1.14 million annually with 30% performance improvement

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed operations and project readiness, implementation of policies for marketing and client satisfaction, account management and business development while maintaining and keeping up with client expectations. Managed resources and saved $1.14 million annually with 30% performance improvement.
highlights: Managed client accounts and identified business opportunities
Integrated senior management staff duties and saved over $1.14 million annually
Launched three T-Mobile authorized stores with net revenues of $600,000 annually

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed workforce operations staff and reviewed performance metrics and workforce adherence to ensure client expectations. Handled daily metrics of help desk performance and involved in recruitment, training and performance reviews.
highlights: Reported daily metrics of help desk performance
Leveraged workforce according to contractual stipulations
